mapper.select: SELECT course.id, course.grade_name AS gradeName, course.default_student_count, de.actual_pay AS actualPay, course.collection AS collection, course.current_price * 10 AS currentPrice, IF(course.type = 1,1,IF( course.type = 3, 4, IF ( course.multimedia_type = 1, 2, 3 ) )) AS type, course.live_status AS lineState, course.start_time AS startTime, course.end_time AS endTime, course.lecturer AS teacherName, ou.id AS userId, course.smallimg_path AS smallimgPath FROM oe_order_detail AS de, oe_course AS course, oe_user AS ou WHERE de.course_id = course.id AND course.user_lecturer_id = ou.id AND de.order_id = #{orderId}
